titles.title: We Limit Not The Truth Of God (easy sweet)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We limit not The truth of God To our poor reach of mind By notions of our day and sect Crude partial and confined Now let a new and better hope Within our hearts be stirred The Lord hath yet More light and truth To break forth From His Word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who dare to bind By his dull sense The oracles of heaven For all the nations Tongues and climes And all the ages given The universe how much unknown That ocean unexplored The Lord hath yet More light and truth To break forth from His Word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Darkling our great Forefathers went The first steps of the way 'Twas but the dawning yet to grow Into the perfect day And grow it shall Our glorious Sun More fervid rays afford The Lord hath yet More light and truth To break forth From His Word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The valleys past Ascending still Our souls would higher climb And look down from Supernal heights On all the bygone times Upward we press The air is clear And the sphere-music heard The Lord hath yet More light and truth To break forth From His Word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Father Son and Spirit send Us increase from above Enlarge expand all Christian hearts To comprehend Thy love And make us all Go on to know With nobler powers conferred The Lord hath yet More light and truth To break forth From His Word{/lang-eng}
